description:
Unleash your inner magic and prepare to unravel the mysteries surrounding a death professor gone rogue. Darkness threatens to engulf the Spiral as you master powerful spells, explore over 22 whimsical worlds, and team-up with friends in this nostalgic wizard turn-based deckbuilding MMORPG.
 
The purchase of Wizard101 includes the 75 zones required to complete Arc 1 of the mainline story content. Travel through the worlds of Wizard City, Krokotopia, Marleybone, MooShu, and Dragonspyre in your quest to save the Spiral from the evil Malistaire Drake!

Please note, this purchase does not include access to following side-content areas and dungeons: Crab Alley, Deep Warrens, Wailing Caverns, The Catacombs, Selenopolis, Castle Darkmoor Dungeon, Kembaalung Dungeon, House of Scales Dungeon, and the Barkingham Palace Dungeon. In addition, the side worlds of Aquila (other than the Garden of Hesperides), Grizzleheim, and Wysteria are not included.

The purchase of Wizard101 on the Nintendo eShop may only be used on the Nintendo Switch™ by the account that completed the purchase.
